sys_template.name: SAM Push Deployment Application
sys_template.short_description: SAM Fulfilment: Change request for Application Deployment
sys_template.template: requested_by=f49c53411b5a5c107b9e8734ec4bcbfb^state=-5^cmdb_ci=^assigned_to=^short_description=SAM Fulfilment: Change request for application deployment^description= Reason for Ticket : Request for performing push deployment ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Please answer the following questions thoroughly: 1. Is this an expedited change? Reason for Expedited: 2. Describe the change in detail. What is changing? What components are required? What will the change do? 3. What is the business purpose for releasing this change? 4. Who requested this change? (EMIT Group, Business Group, etc.) 5. What are the target dates? Who is the target audience? 6. List impacted servers if applicable? 7. List all collections if applicable? 8. State the number of machines/users who will be impacted if known? 9. What is the potential worst-case business impact? How is this being mitigated? 10. What is the potential worst-case service impact? How is this being mitigated? 11. Does this change impact High Risk Environments? (Yes/No) 12. Which environments are impacted? (Ex. XOM/XTO/WQ1) -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- Please fill the below information in Work Details tab 1. Business Justification 2. Install Plan 3. Back-out Plan -------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- List the steps required to complete a full back-out. Which groups/vendors need to be involved? How will you verify the back-out was successful? 1. Service Impact Assessment 2. Test plan ^business_service=b6845a741bdf2010eea453de034bcbbf^u_business_approver=708947cc1ba201501cf976ae034bcb7f^assignment_group=5d970402db23f700121ed5ab5e9619d0^EQ
